trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property specifies whether the list is always displayed or whether the list is displayed in a drop-down.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性會指定是否會永遠顯示清單，或是否顯示在下拉式清單中的清單。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A> property also specifies whether the text portion can be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A>屬性也會指定是否可編輯的文字部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>藉由設定控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.DropDownStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBoxStyle>值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the list is displayed by clicking the down arrow and that the text portion is editable.
trans-unit.target: 指定清單是以按一下向下鍵的方式顯示，以及指定文字部分為可編輯。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user can enter a new value and is not limited to selecting an existing value in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示使用者可以在清單中輸入新的值，並且不限於選取現有的值。

trans-unit.source: When using this setting, the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Append" /> value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode" /> works the same as the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個設定時，<see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Append" /> 之 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode" /> 值的運作方式與 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" /> 值相同。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the list is displayed by clicking the down arrow and that the text portion is not editable.
trans-unit.target: 指定清單是以按一下向下鍵的方式顯示，以及指定文字部分為不可編輯。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user cannot enter a new value.
trans-unit.target: 這表示使用者無法輸入新的值，

trans-unit.source: Only values already in the list can be selected.
trans-unit.target: 只能選取清單中現有的值。

trans-unit.source: The list displays only if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" />.
trans-unit.target: 只有 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.AutoCompleteMode" /> 為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.Suggest" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode.SuggestAppend" /> 時，才顯示這個清單。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the list is always visible and that the text portion is editable.
trans-unit.target: 指定一律顯示清單，以及指定文字部分為可編輯。

trans-unit.source: This means that the user can enter a new value and is not limited to selecting an existing value in the list.
trans-unit.target: 這表示使用者可以在清單中輸入新的值，並且不限於選取現有的值。
